name: Grocery Pickup
description: Help elderly folks and folks with disabilities access food and prevent isolation in your community by picking up, delivering, and putting away groceries.

name: Giving Rides
description: Love to drive? Give a ride. Help folks who lack transportation get back and forth safely from their appointments or errands.

name: Home Improvement
description: Help out with light projects like interior and exterior painting, hanging pictures, changing light bulbs and smoke detector batteries and more.

name: Tuition
description: Music, Science, Math, Technology - anything goes.  Give back to your community by helping underprivileged kids.  If teaching and volunteering is your passion, then this is an ideal match

name: Home Helper
description: From organizing bookshelves to washing windows and light dusting â€“ this role helps individuals with light household tasks that would otherwise be a challenge to complete.
